Package dev.vernite.vernite.project

Class ProjectController

java.lang.Object
dev.vernite.vernite.project.ProjectController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/project") public class ProjectController extends Object
Rest controller for performing CRUD operations on Projects entities.

  • Method Details

    • create

      @PostMapping public Project create(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid CreateProject create)
      Create new project. Creating user will be automatically added to that project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      create - data for new project
      Returns:
      newly created project

    • get

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Project get(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve project. If user is not member of project with given ID this method returns not found error.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      project with given ID

    • update

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public Project update(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid UpdateProject update)
      Update project with given ID. Performs partial update using only supplied fields from request body. Authenticated user must be member of project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      update - data to update
      Returns:
      project after update

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void delete(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Delete project with given ID. Project will be soft deleted and full delete wil happen after a week. Authenticated user must be member of project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project

    • getProjectMembers

      @GetMapping("/{id}/member") public List<ProjectMember> getProjectMembers(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve project members. Authenticated user must be member of project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      list of project members

    • getProjectMember

      @GetMapping("/{id}/member/{memberId}") public ProjectMember getProjectMember(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id, @PathVariable long memberId)
      Retrieve project member. Authenticated user must be member of project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      memberId - ID of searched user
      Returns:
      project member

    • addProjectMembers

      @PostMapping("/member") public ProjectInvite addProjectMembers(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @RequestBody ProjectInvite invite)
      Adds members to projects. Adds every given user to every given project. In order to add users to project authenticated user must be member of every project. If authenticated user is not member of project no one will be added to this project. If user with given email / username does not exists no error will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      invite - list of project and user to add.
      Returns:
      list with project and users which were added to projects

    • deleteMember

      @PutMapping("/{id}/member") public List<User> deleteMember(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id, @RequestBody List<Long> ids)
      Remove members from project. Authenticated user must be member of project and have sufficient privileges.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      ids - IDs of users to remove
      Returns:
      removed users

    • leaveProject

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}/member") public void leaveProject(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Leave project. Authenticated user leaves project with given ID.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project

    • getTimeTracks

      @GetMapping("/{id}/track") public List<TimeTrack> getTimeTracks(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve project time tracks. Authenticated user must be member of project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      list with all time tracks from given project

    • getIssues

      @GetMapping("/{id}/integration/git/issue") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Issue> getIssues(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve git issues for project. Retrieve all issues from integrated git providers.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      list with issues

    • getPullRequests

      @GetMapping("/{id}/integration/git/pull") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<PullRequest> getPullRequests(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve git pull requests for project. Retrieve all pull requests from integrated git providers.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      list with pull requests

    • getBranches

      @GetMapping("/{id}/integration/git/branch") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Branch> getBranches(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Retrieve git branches for project. Retrieve all branches from integrated git providers.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      list with branches

    • getEvents

      @GetMapping("/{id}/events") public Set<Event> getEvents(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id, long from, long to, @ModelAttribute EventFilter filter)
      Retrieve events for project.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      from - timestamp after events happen
      to - timestamp before events happen
      filter - filter for events
      Returns:
      list with events after 'from' and before 'to' filtered by 'filter'

    • uploadLogo

      @PostMapping(path="/{id}/logo", consumes="multipart/form-data") public File uploadLogo(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id, @RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Update project logo. Given file will be converted to image/webp format with resolution 400x400. Alpha channel is supported.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      file - new logo image
      Returns:
      new logo file information

    • uploadImage

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}/logo") public void uploadImage(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Delete project logo. After that logo will be empty.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project

    • createCalendarSync

      @PostMapping("/{id}/events/sync") public String createCalendarSync(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
      Create calendar synchronization link. Creates link for iCalendar format synchronization of project calendar.
      Parameters:
      user - logged in user
      id - ID of project
      Returns:
      link to project calendar in iCalendar format

    • getAuditLog

      @GetMapping("/{id}/auditlog") public List<AuditLog> getAuditLog(@NotNull @NotNull User user, @PathVariable long id)
